scrollDown.description: Scroll down page by a single step

scrollUp.description: Scroll up page by a single step

scrollLeft.description: Scroll left page by a single step

scrollRight.description: Scroll right page by a single step

scrollToLeft.description: Scroll to far left of page

scrollToRight.description: Scroll to far right of page

previousTab.description: Activate the tab to the left of the active tab of the current window

nextTab.description: Activate the tab to the right of the active tab of the current window

firstTab.description: Activate the first tab of the current window

lastTab.description: Activate the last tab of the current window

moveTabLeft.description: Move the active tab of the current window left

moveTabRight.description: Move the active tab of the current window right

moveTabFirst.description: Move the active tab of the current window to the far left

moveTabLast.description: Move the active tab of the current window to the far right

closeTab.description: Close the active tab of the current window

closeOtherTabs.description: Close all tabs of the current window except the active tab

closeRightTabs.description: Close all tabs to the right of the active tab of the current window

closeLeftTabs.description: Close all tabs to the left of the active tab of the current window

newTab.description: Create and activate a new tab

restoreTab.description: Reopen and activate the last closed tab

duplicateTab.description: Duplicate and activate the active tab of the current window

zoomIn.description: Zoom in the active tab of the current window

zoomOut.description: Zoom out the active tab of the current window

zoomReset.description: Reset the zoom of the active tab of the current window

refreshTab.description: Refresh the active tab of the current window

refreshAllTabs.description: Refresh all tabs of the current window

toggleMuteTab.description: Toggle the mute state of the active tab of the current window

toggleMuteAllTabs.description: Toggle the mute state of all tabs of all windows

togglePinTab.description: Toggle the pin state of the active tab of the current window
